name: Corpse Collector
description:
Corpse Collector

You are Java, one of the few survivors of a zombie outbreak. You go around collecting corpses... but what for...?

As you collect the corpses, you'll go down memory lane...

An RPG Maker Horror game, it should take around half an hour to beat!

A game made for the 16th RPG Maker Horror Jam! It's very unpolished right now sadly; and I hope to update this at some point with a bit more polish. ^^;
